[vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1458638182050{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”Añade tu moto” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:28|text_align:left|line_height:34px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1619379657631{margin-top: 16px !important;margin-bottom: 12px !important;}”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][stm_posts_available][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][stm_add_a_car show_car_title=”yes” use_inputs=”yes” items=”%5B%7B%22tab_title_single%22%3A%22Extras%22%2C%22tab_title_labels%22%3A%22Bluetooth%2C%20Reproductor%20de%20DVD%22%7D%2C%7B%22tab_title_labels%22%3A%22neblineros%2C%20aros%2C%20silenciador%22%7D%5D” stm_phrases=”Excellent condition, Always garaged, No accidents, Satellite radio, Must see, Factory GPS system” stm_title_user=”Regístrate” stm_text_user=”By providing us with your phone number, you acknowledge and agree that we (and/or our service providers) may contact you at the mobile or other telephone number you list, in order to provide you with additional information or offers regarding our services, and that in doing so we may utilize automatic dialing services.” stm_histories=”Carfax, AutoCheck, Carfax 1 Owner, Other” stm_title_price=”Precio para tu moto” stm_title_desc=”El precio debe ser acorde a la realidad, puedes subir tu moto y te la valoramos con gusto” taxonomy=”condition, make, serie, ca-year,” link=”url:http%3A%2F%2Fmotorstest.loc%2Fclassified%2Fcontact-us%2F|title:new%20version||”]Guia y recomendaciones
Trata de usar fotos en formato horizontal de buena calidad  y con un buen fondo, al menos deben tener de 00 x 470 pixeles.

Recuerda tomar fotos de detalles particulares y observaciones que puedan tener como rines de lujo, acabado, frenos , llantas o daños , como usuario sólo podrás subir una foto pero como Dealer podrás usar 5 fotos[/stm_add_a_car][/vc_column][/vc_row]
